fields.name: Ability:
fields.value:
- Check a player and learn their role's rating in ⁠Unknown. Then, deal your target an attack based off of that tier.
> A, S, and above: none
> B: Basic
> C or unrated: Powerful
> D: Unstoppable
> F, and below: Overkill

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: A role's rating will be simplified to just its letter. For example, "F-" will be seen as just "F" by this role.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the death of every person whose role is B tier or below. This excludes yourself and anyone with a role that hasn't been rated yet.
